TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sakaudip, title = sakaudip, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sakaudip} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:維持生活) u sakauzip ita ku bali. 我們靠空氣生存.
(kamo no holam:維持生活) o sakaozip ita ko bali. 我們靠空氣生存.
